name: Fly With B.O.S.S.
description:
"Welcome to a B.O.S.S. - Lunar Flight Industries!

 

When you come to work for us as a hardware tester, you take the initiative to upgrade the parts to the frames of our machines. Our noble goal is to make the search for treasures easy in space to u... to You! To our customers! Cuz space is full of fascinating secrets... and also full of valuable ores and maybe, some treasures.

 Please note that while employed by us, you must be confidential and your health insurance must be dated!"

-------

 

This game title is made for the VimJam2- project in just only handful of days! If you're a representative of the gaming company an individual player, and get interested to our game title, make comfortable to leave a contact request in our emails or to our LinkedIn- accounts

 

 

Created by:

  Hiisileiri, TheSimon642
